title: Can't login
body:
I've been playing League since S3, and have had minimal issues. Since the latest patch, I can't login. I've gone through the checklist to make sure nothing is from there. Last night playing I noticed that whenever I entered hextech crafting my client would crash, weird but not totally crazy. Then again last night, while everyone was having issue, I went to log in and got the "too many people trying to log in right now" screen. After waiting I got unable to login and the general "connection error, cannot connect to PVP.net server." I first repaired my client and then did a full uninstall and reinstall, still no luck.

Any ideas?

replies.body: There was some downtime last night with a server maintenance, which we tracked on the[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Some players also reported login issues this morning, but it seems that things have been settling down.  Are you still having any issues getting in?
I still can't login after the maintenance and it's been going on since last night. I've done everything listed for support and still can't get in
Yes I did finally get in! Thank you for checking in.
